name: react-native-photo-manipulator
description: Image processing library to edit photo programmatically in React Native
author: Woraphot Chokratanasombat <guhungry@gmail.com>

ios.sim.debug.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -project example/ios/PhotoManipulatorExample.xcodeproj -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 5s' -scheme PhotoManipulatorExample -parallelizeTargets -configuration Debug -derivedDataPath example/ios/build -sdk iphonesimulator -UseModernBuildSystem=NO | xcpretty -k
ios.sim.debug.name: iPhone 5s

ios.sim.release.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -project example/ios/PhotoManipulatorExample.xcodeproj -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 5s' -scheme PhotoManipulatorExample -parallelizeTargets -configuration Release -derivedDataPath example/ios/build -sdk iphonesimulator -UseModernBuildSystem=NO | xcpretty -k
ios.sim.release.name: iPhone 5s

android.emu.debug.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && cd example/android && ./gradlew assembleDebug assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=debug && cd ../..
android.emu.debug.name: TestingAVD

android.emu.release.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && cd example/android && ./gradlew assembleRelease assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=release && cd ../..
android.emu.release.name: TestingAVD
